articles.title: Muslim woman in US ordered to move from emergency row seats, told she could 'bring the whole plane down' - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: American-born Fatima Altakrouri says a Southwest attendant said she "couldn’t speak English and would bring the whole plane down in an emergency”.
articles.content:
American-born and raised Muslim woman Fatima Altakrouri says she was discriminated against by a Southwest Airlines attendant for wearing her hijab.

articles.title: JBS Canada beef processing facility in Alberta resumes production after cyberattack - CTV Toronto
articles.description: The JBS Canada beef processing facility in Alberta has resumed production after a cyberattack that impacted the company's operations in North America and Australia.
articles.content:
CALGARY -- 
The JBS Canada beef processing facility in Alberta has resumed production after a cyberattack that impacted the company's operations in North America and Australia.

articles.title: 'You'll never play as well as me': Venus Williams weighs in on media row - IOL
articles.description: American star Venus Williams says he has her own defence mechanisms, developed over her long career, when dealing with the press.
articles.content:
PARIS American star Venus Williams said Tuesday she has never suffered at press conferences, telling French Open reporters: "I know every person asking me a question cannot play as well as me".
